metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0479 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
reportbug before 6.4.4+deb7u1 and 6.5.x before 6.5.0+nmu1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via vectors related to compare_versions and reportbug/checkversions.py.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-reportbug - 6.5.0+nmu1ubuntu0.1
reportbug - 6.5.0+nmu1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: reportbug package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0+nmu1ubuntu0.1').
